title: ESR’s new 10,000mAh MagSafe Power Bank can charge two iPhone 13s at a time
content:
Today, ESR is launching the latest addition to its HaloLock stable of iPhone 13 accessories, debuting its very first MagSafe power bank. Arriving with a streamlined design, there’s still a 10,000mAh internal battery alongside ability to refuel a second device with its USB-C port. Now available for purchase, you can also score a launch discount by getting the full scope down below.

more…

The post ESR’s new 10,000mAh MagSafe Power Bank can charge two iPhone 13s at a time  appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: ESR MagSafe Power Bank arrives with an increased 10,000mAh internal battery as well as the ability to charge two devices at a time.
